title: 1969 Steinway Grand Piano - 8Dio Legacy Series (Kontakt)
description:
This is an excellent piano sampled by 8Dio, for using in Kontakt.

Personally, I use this piano for recording and day to day playing. It's great.



But when I'm using my old pc, I prefer to use Piano One

"Piano One utilizes only 150MB, which is quite a small footprint, making Piano One usable even on older PCs. There is no waiting time when loading and the CPU usage is so small that it's virtually unnoticeable."



If I have to record, my choice is this piano, the 1969 Steinway Grand Piano. It sounds really great.

It has different settings, which includes:

Default (the normal piano)
Staccato
Reversed
Glisten
Infinity (a setting I tend to use a lot, since it can be used like a Piano + Synth setup)
Ethereal
Glockiano
Suppressiano
Emperor
Golden
The Future

You can use it also with a pedal, to sustain the keys you touch.

_______________________________________________________


Overview

    Price: $149
    Deep-Sampled 1969 Steinway Concert (D) Grand
    6 Microphone Positions
    5.0GB / 9.272 Samples
    Direct download / Cloud Server System
    Product only available as download

Core Specifications

    Deep-Sampled 1969 Steinway Concert (D) Grand
    6 Microphone Perspectives (Overhead, Keyboard/Player, Damper, Spot, Ambient & Room)
    Unique Staccato Samples with Round Robin
    12 Additional Piano Morph Patches
    Advanced Controls (ex. Pedal Volume, Velocity Curves, EQ, Convolution)

Core Requirements

    Full Retail version of Kontakt 4.2 or later required
    5GB harddrive space
    Ability to download
    PC 2.4GZ+, 4GB ram
    MAC 2.6Ghz, 4GB ram

Sample resolution: 44.1Khz / 24Bit stereo

_______________________________________________________


Try to download this torrent, even if The Pirate Bay shows it has 0 seeders. It's taken from another website, and surely TPB only counts seeders and leechers from this site
